Yoga: Yoga is a low-impact exercise that can help improve flexibility, balance, and overall well-being. It can be done at home with online tutorials or through a local studio.
Jumping rope: Jumping rope is a full-body workout that can be done anywhere, indoors or outdoors. It is a great cardio exercise that can help improve heart health and burn calories.

Running: Running is a great way to get a cardio workout and improve your overall fitness. It can be done on a treadmill, track, or on a trail. You can also try different types of runs such as interval training or hill sprints.

Bodyweight cardio: Bodyweight cardio exercises such as jumping jacks, mountain climbers, and high knees can be done in the comfort of your own home. These exercises can help improve heart health and burn calories.
Walking: Walking is a low-impact exercise that can be done by anyone, regardless of age or fitness level. It is a great way to improve cardiovascular health and burn calories.
